title: Band, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidered with silk and edged with lace (with needle knotted trim)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: White linen with border design of cherubim holding a large rinceau in blue silk. Tiny pointed edge of blue and yellow linen "punto in aria."
